explore.title: Explore Beautiful Poreč
explore.description: Poreč is a stunning Istrian coastal town with rich history and beautiful beaches. Here are our top recommendations:
explore.basilicaDesc: UNESCO World Heritage site (5 min walk)
explore.oldtownDesc: Roman streets and Venetian architecture (3 min walk)
explore.beachesDesc: Plava Laguna and Zelena Laguna (10 min by bus)
explore.restaurantsDesc: Ask our concierge for the best local taverns
explore.daytripsDesc: Rovinj, Motovun, or wine tasting in Istrian hills
